TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerDataSourceView extends System.Object

summary.span: 做為設計階段資料來源檢視類別的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for design-time data source view classes.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂物件和自訂類別和兩個自訂類別。The following code example shows how to create a custom object along with a custom class and two custom classes. 這個範例是針對較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger sample for the class. [!code-csharp[DataSourceDesignerSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/CS/DataSourceDesignerSample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataSourceDesignerSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/VB/DataSourceDesignerSample.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[DataSourceDesignerSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/CS/DataSourceDesignerSample.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DataSourceDesignerSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/VB/DataSourceDesignerSample.vb#5)]

para.span: 當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫方法以建立範例資料，並符合屬性，或從資料來源傳回實際資料。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you must override the method either to create sample data that conforms to the property, or to return real data from the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: protected DesignerDataSourceView (System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner owner, string viewName);

span.span: The parent data source designer.

param.name: viewName
param.span: 資料來源中的檢視名稱。

span.span: The name of the view in the data source.

summary.span: 使用指定的資料來源設計工具和檢視名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified data source designer and view name.

summary.span: 取得建立這個 控制項之設計工具的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the designer that created this control.

value.span: 物件會在建立目前的 執行個體時提供。

span.span: The object provided when the current instance was created.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeData (int minimumRows, out bool isSampleData);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeData(int32 minimumRows, [out] bool& isSampleData) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetDesignTimeData (minimumRows As Integer, ByRef isSampleData As Boolean) As IEnumerable
public: virtual System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ GetDesignTimeData(int minimumRows, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % isSampleData);

param.name: minimumRows
param.span: 要傳回的資料列數目下限。

span.span: The minimum number of rows to return.

param.name: isSampleData
param.span: 表示傳回的資料是範例資料， 則表示傳回的資料是實際資料。

span.span: to indicate that the returned data is sample data; to indicate that the returned data is live data.

summary.span: 產生設計階段資料，該資料符合使用所指定資料列數之關聯資料來源控制項的結構描述，且指出會傳回範例還是實際資料。

span.span: Generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control using the specified number of rows, indicating whether it is returning sample data or real data.

returns.span: 物件，包含要在設計階段顯示的資料。

span.span: A object containing data to display at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 如需完整的使用範例方法檢視、 結構描述，以及資料來源設計師中，請參閱。For a complete example of using the method with views, schemas, and a data source designer, see .

summary.span: 取得建立 類別的這個執行個體時所提供檢視的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the view as provided when this instance of the class was created.
The view name.

summary.span: 取得結構描述，其描述這個檢視物件所代表的資料來源檢視。

span.span: Gets a schema that describes the data source view that is represented by this view object.
An object.
